languages.text: {n}Губернатор нажимает несколько кнопок на встроенном в наруч когитаторе и удивленно поднимает взгляд.{/n} "Не понимаю... Корабль действительно отбыл с орбиты, однако сделал он это — вы не поверите — по визе Вольного Торговца! Потому никто и не смел ему препятствовать".

{n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор нажимает несколько кнопок на встроенном в наруч когитаторе и удивленно поднимает взгляд.{/n} "Не понимаю... Корабль действительно отбыл с орбиты, однако сделал он это — вы не поверите — по визе Вольного Торговца! Потому никто и не смел ему препятствовать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from the orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorization! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

{n}Urbend presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from the orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorization! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

{n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

{n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

{n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

languages.text: {n}总督按下了手镯内置沉思者上的几个按钮，之后惊讶地抬头看着你。{/n}“我不明白这是怎么回事……那艘船确实离开了轨道，可它是在行商浪人的授权之下才离开轨道的！天知道怎么会有这种怪事！所以，当时根本没人敢阻止它离开。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督按下了手镯内置思考器上的几个按钮，之后惊讶地抬头看着你。{/n}“我不明白这是怎么回事……那艘船确实离开了轨道，可它是在行商浪人的授权之下才离开轨道的！天知道怎么会有这种怪事！所以，当时根本没人敢阻止它离开。”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador pulsa una serie de botones del cogitador de su brazalete y te mira, sorprendido.{/n} «No lo entiendo... la nave sí abandonó la órbita, pero, aunque no me crea, ¡lo hizo con la autorización de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! Por eso nadie se atrevió a impedir que partiera».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador pulsa una serie de botones del cogitador de su brazalete y te mira, sorprendido.{/n} «No lo entiendo... la nave sí abandonó la órbita, pero, aunque no me crea, ¡lo hizo con la autorización de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! Por eso nadie se atrevió a impedir que partiera».

languages.text: {n}総督は籠手に組み込まれた考算機のボタンをいくつか押して、驚いた表情でこちらを見た。{/n}「理解できません…あの船は確かに軌道上から離脱しましたが、信じられないことにそれは自由開拓者の許可に基づいて行われたものです！だから、誰も出発を阻止する勇気がなかったのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は籠手に組み込まれた考算機のボタンをいくつか押して、驚いた表情でこちらを見た。{/n}「理解できません…あの船は確かに軌道上から離脱しましたが、信じられないことにそれは自由開拓者の許可に基づいて行われたものです！だから、誰も出発を阻止する勇気がなかったのです」

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur drückt einige Tasten auf dem Cogitator in seiner Armschiene und blickt überrascht zu dir auf.{/n} "Das verstehe ich nicht ... Das Schiff ist tatsächlich aus dem Orbit abgereist, hatte aber – ob Ihr es glaubt oder nicht – eine Autorisierung durch {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}! Deshalb hat auch niemand gewagt, es aufzuhalten."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur drückt einige Tasten auf dem Cogitator in seiner Armschiene und blickt überrascht zu dir auf.{/n} "Das verstehe ich nicht ... Das Schiff ist tatsächlich aus dem Orbit abgereist, hatte aber – ob Ihr es glaubt oder nicht – eine Autorisierung durch {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}! Deshalb hat auch niemand gewagt, es aufzuhalten."

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur appuie sur une série de boutons du cogitateur implanté dans son bras avant de lever vers vous un regard surpris.{/n} « Je ne comprends pas... Ce vaisseau a bien quitté l'orbite de notre planète, mais, et je vous prie de me croire, avec l'autorisation {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! Cela explique pourquoi personne n'a osé troubler son départ. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur appuie sur une série de boutons du cogitateur implanté dans son bras avant de lever vers vous un regard surpris.{/n} « Je ne comprends pas... Ce vaisseau a bien quitté l'orbite de notre planète, mais, et je vous prie de me croire, avec l'autorisation {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! Cela explique pourquoi personne n'a osé troubler son départ. »

languages.text: {n}Vali, bilekliğine kurulu kavramsayardaki bazı tuşlara basıp şaşkınlık içinde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Anlamıyorum. Gemi gerçekten de yörüngeden kalkmış ama inanır mısınız bilmem, Hür Tacir'in yetkisiyle kalkmış! Bu yüzden de ayrılmasını engellemeye kimse cüret edememiş."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor presses a number of buttons on the cogitator built into his bracer and looks up at you in surprise.{/n} "I don't understand... The ship did indeed depart from orbit, but it did so — if you can believe it — on the Rogue Trader's authorisation! That is why no one dared to impede its departure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali kolluğuna kurulmuş kavramsayardaki bazı tuşlara basıyor ve şaşkınlık içinde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Anlamıyorum. Gemi gerçekten de yörüngeden kalkmış ama inanır mısınız bilmem, Hür Tacir'in yetkisiyle kalkmış! Bu yüzden de ayrılmasını engellemeye kimse cüret edememiş."
